# The Data Model

The data model is a fictional subscription business. 

The Entity-Relationship Diagram (ERD) is as follows:

```{mermaid}
erDiagram
    subscribers ||--o{ orders : has

    subscribers {
        int subscriber_id PK
        varchar first_name
        varchar last_name
        varchar email
        date subscription_date
        boolean is_active
        varchar tier
    }

    orders {
        int order_id PK
        int subscriber_id FK "References subscribers"
        date order_date
        decimal amount
    }

```
